title: Tenpoint raises $235m as FDA approves presbyopia eye drops
summary: Funding to support commercial launch and continued development of treatments designed to ‘rejuvenate vision in the aging eye.’ British-American biotech Tenpoint Therapeutics has raised $235 million in new financing and announced the FDA approval of its once-daily prescription eye drop for presbyopia, a common form of age-related vision loss. The funding, which combines $85 million […] The post Tenpoint raises $235m as FDA approves presbyopia eye drops appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Danny Sullivan
